includedAssets.title: The Mastodon In The Room

includedAssets.synopsis: Season six of the delectably dark crime drama. Brennan, Booth and the team are reunited for a case involving an unidentified boy.

includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep2 - The Couple In The Cave

includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep4 - The Body & The Bounty

includedAssets.title: The Bones That Weren't

includedAssets.title: The Shallow In The Deep
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep6 - The Shallow In The Deep
includedAssets.synopsis: The past & present collide when human remains from a 150-year-old ship are linked to a recent murder, leading Brennan & Booth to a 'cougar' cruise.

includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep17 - The Feet On The Beach
includedAssets.synopsis: When seven pairs of dismembered feet are washed ashore after a storm, Brennan and Booth have to visit a 'body farm', where Bones is in her element.

includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep22 - The Hole In The Heart

includedAssets.title: The Change In The Game
includedAssets.altTitle: S6, Ep23 - The Change In The Game
includedAssets.synopsis: Season six reaches its climactic finale. Following last week's shocking shooting, will Brennan and Booth's grief help ignite their romantic spark?

includedAssets.title: Season 6
includedAssets.synopsis: The smash-hit series returns for a sixth season as a new enemy hits the Jefersonian team close to home. Dark and witty drama starring Emily Deschanel and David Boreanaz.

includedIn.title: Bones
includedIn.synopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance “Bones” Brennan joins forces with FBI special agent Seeley Booth to investigate murders where the only remnants of the victims are bones.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Forensic anthropologist Dr. Temperance “Bones” Brennan joins forces with FBI special agent Seeley Booth to solve murders using the victim’s bones.
